ValueDescription.1: Comparator output is present on the CxOUT pin
Comparator event that is defined by EVPOL[1:0] has occured; subsequent triggers and interrupts are disabled until the bit is cleared

ValueDescription.0: Non-inverting input connects to the CxINA pin
ValueDescription.1: Non-inverting input connects to the internal reference defined by CVREFSEL bit in CMSTAT register

ValueDescription.0: Inverting input of the comparator connects to the band gap reference voltage
ValueDescription.1: Inverting input of the comparator connects to the CxIND pin
ValueDescription.2: Inverting input of the comparator connects to the CxINC pin
ValueDescription.3: Inverting input of the comparator connects to the CxINB pin
